verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

“\w Tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w encamp|strong="H2583"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Pi-hahiroth|strong="H6367"\w*, \w between|strong="H2583"\w* \w Migdol|strong="H4024"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*. \w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w encamp|strong="H2583"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, directly \w opposite|strong="H5921"\w* \w Baal-zephon|strong="H1189"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, ‘\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* wandering \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w in|strong="H5921"\w* confusion; \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* boxed \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w*.’

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w fled|strong="H1272"\w*, \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w officials|strong="H5650"\w* \w changed|strong="H2015"\w* \w their|strong="H5647"\w* \w minds|strong="H3824"\w* \w about|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* said, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*? \w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w released|strong="H7971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w serving|strong="H5647"\w* \w us|strong="H5046"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* Pharaoh prepared \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w army|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3605"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* 600 \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* best \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w officers|strong="H7991"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w hardened|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w so|strong="H3318"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* marching \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w defiantly|strong="H7311"\w*.\f + \fr 14:8 \ft Or marching out boldly; literally marching out with an upraised hand\f*

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4713"\w*—\w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w and|strong="H7393"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w* \w and|strong="H7393"\w* \w troops|strong="H2428"\w*—\w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Israelites \w and|strong="H7393"\w* \w overtook|strong="H5381"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w camped|strong="H2583"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w near|strong="H6440"\w* \w Pi-hahiroth|strong="H6367"\w*, \w opposite|strong="H5921"\w* \w Baal-zephon|strong="H1189"\w*.

\w They|strong="H4100"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “\w Was|strong="H4872"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w because|strong="H1097"\w* \w there|strong="H1097"\w* \w were|strong="H4714"\w* \w no|strong="H6213"\w* \w graves|strong="H6913"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w that|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w us|strong="H6213"\w* \w into|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*? \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H4057"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w us|strong="H6213"\w* \w by|strong="H3318"\w* \w bringing|strong="H3318"\w* \w us|strong="H6213"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H4057"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*?

\w Did|strong="H3808"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, ‘\w Leave|strong="H2308"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w alone|strong="H2308"\w* \w so|strong="H4480"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H4057"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*’? \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H1697"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w been|strong="H5647"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w told|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, “\w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*. \w Stand|strong="H3320"\w* \w firm|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w accomplish|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4713"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3898"\w*; \w you|strong="H3898"\w* need only \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w still|strong="H2790"\w*.” Parting the Red Sea

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w crying|strong="H6817"\w* \w out|strong="H5265"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Me|strong="H1696"\w*? \w Tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w go|strong="H3068"\w* \w forward|strong="H5265"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w as|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w lift|strong="H7311"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w staff|strong="H4294"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w stretch|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w divide|strong="H1234"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w so|strong="H3027"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w can|strong="H1121"\w* \w go|strong="H3478"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w dry|strong="H3004"\w* \w ground|strong="H3004"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7393"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w harden|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4713"\w* so \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* go \w in|strong="H2388"\w* after \w them|strong="H2388"\w*. \w Then|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w gain|strong="H2388"\w* \w honor|strong="H3513"\w* \w by|strong="H3605"\w* means \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w and|strong="H7393"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w and|strong="H7393"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w and|strong="H7393"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \f + \fr 14:19 \ft Or Angel\f* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* God, \w who|strong="H3478"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, withdrew \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w behind|strong="H5975"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*. \w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w also|strong="H3478"\w* \w moved|strong="H1980"\w* \w from|strong="H5265"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w behind|strong="H5975"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*,

\w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* between \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w camps|strong="H4264"\w* \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H7126"\w* lit \w up|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.\f + \fr 14:20 \ft LXX and the night passed\f* \w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w long|strong="H3605"\w* \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w went|strong="H3478"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H2088"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w stretched|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* drove \w back|strong="H5186"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w strong|strong="H5794"\w* \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w turned|strong="H5186"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w into|strong="H3212"\w* \w dry|strong="H2724"\w* \w land|strong="H2724"\w*. \w So|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w were|strong="H4325"\w* \w divided|strong="H1234"\w*,

\w And|strong="H7393"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4713"\w* \w chased|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H7291"\w* \w them|strong="H7291"\w*—\w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, \w and|strong="H7393"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*—\w and|strong="H7393"\w* \w followed|strong="H7291"\w* \w them|strong="H7291"\w* \w into|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

\w At|strong="H3068"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* watch, however, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w looked|strong="H8259"\w* \w down|strong="H8259"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w army|strong="H4264"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4713"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* fire \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* threw \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w into|strong="H1961"\w* \w confusion|strong="H2000"\w*.
